content: marker m1 k1 slip marker k across to next marker slip marker k1 m1 k until 1 before next marker m1 k1 slip marker k to end of round k1 round even then work next round again as follows k1 m1 k until 1 before marker m1 k1 slip marker k across to next marker slip marker k1 m1 k until 1 before next marker m1 k1 slip marker k to end of round for sizes xs and xl only work r1-r4 from 5-row pattern above on 5th row work as follows k1 m1 k until 1 before marker m1 k1 slip marker k across to next marker slip marker k1 m1 k until 1 before next marker m1 k1 slip marker k to end of round you should now have 178 188 202 216 224 240 252 258 276 stitches and 46 46 51 56 56 61 66 66 71 row total including the collar on next round k to first marker place stitches between 1st and 2nd marker on waste yarn or holder you can now drop both of these markers join and k to third marker place stitches between 3rd and last marker on waste yarn or holder dropping 3rd marker join and begin next round what you have done is set aside the stitches that will later become the sleeves while joining the round underneath the arms to create a seamless chest you should have one marker remaining to indicate the beginning of each round you should now have 114 116 126 134 136 144 152 154 164 stitches joined in a round on your needle and 32 36 38 41 44 48 50 52 56 stitches on each piece of scrap yarn on next round work in st st for 16 16 16 5 17 17 5 18 18 18 19 or until length desired p all stitches one round then k 5 more rounds bobble loosely sleeves make 2 r & l instructions place the 32 36 38 41 44 48 50 52 56 held stitches on the needle pick up 4 4 4 6 6 6 6 6 6 stitches evenly along the side of the body where the underarm will be join pm and k 1 7 9 3 3 5 1 6 1 rounds on next round begin following pattern right sleeve k 10 6 6 5 4 3 3 3 3 rounds on next round k2togtbl k to end of round repeat in curly brackets 8 12 12 15 18 22 23 23 25 times left sleeve k 10 6 6 5 4 3 3 3 3 rounds on next round k to 2 before end of round k2tog repeat in curly brackets 8 12 12 15 18 22 23 23 25 times k 0 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 0 more rounds p 1 round k 5 rounds then bobble loosely finishing weave in any loose ends and block if necessary 2 ©jenifer stark - www jeniferstark
